tasks.title: Test the heySPRK.com homepage UX
tasks.description: First test task for Shuri. Go to https://heysprk.com and evaluate the homepage from a first-time visitor perspective. Check: clarity of value prop, CTA visibility, mobile responsiveness, any friction points. Post findings as comments.

tasks.title: SEO audit for heySPRK.com
tasks.description:
Comprehensive SEO audit of heySPRK.com:

1. Technical SEO check (meta tags, schema, robots.txt, sitemap)
2. Core Web Vitals assessment
3. Keyword opportunity analysis
4. Competitor comparison (top 3)
5. Prioritized recommendations

Post findings as comments with confidence levels.

tasks.title: Research competitor pricing for business acquisition market
tasks.description:
Research top 5 competitors in the business acquisition/search fund space:

1. What services do they offer?
2. What are their pricing models?
3. How do they position themselves?
4. What do G2/Capterra reviews say about them?

Provide evidence for every claim.
